resource.name: CorStat - Fire Calls for Service
resource.description: Data is collected from the City of Corona's public safety solution. Data is updated nightly. The data represents the response times of all Fire unit that arrive on-scene to an incident.

resource.name: CorStat - Corona Project Details List
resource.description: Corona Project List - Capital Project Details Dataset ID

resource.name: CorStat - Budget to Actual RV
resource.description: Explore the City of Corona’s revenue sources which provide the funding for the operating activities and capital projects. Revenue can be viewed by fund type, fund name, or revenue categories (property taxes, sales tax, utility service charges, etc.).

resource.name: CorStat - Library Programs & Tours by Month
resource.description:
Sum of total programs/tours provided by the Corona Public Library divided by age group. Data is provided by a monthly administration report created by the Library and Recreation Services management staff.
Update Frequency: Monthly
Data Disclaimer: The City Of Corona (“Corona”) provides data available on this website as a service to the public. The data provided by Corona is based on historical data, information directly provided by Corona, information directly provided by Corona contractors and in some cases, information acquired during physical inspections. Corona does not guarantee the accuracy of this data and assumes no liability for any errors. The data shall be used for the sole purpose of providing the public with information regarding this program and not for any commercial, legal or other use. Corona assumes no liability for any decisions made or action taken or not taken by anyone using data provided from this website. Corona reserves the right to alter, amend or terminate at any time the display of this data.
resource.attribution: City of Corona Public Library Team

resource.name: CorStat - Police Department Response Times
resource.description:
Detailed summary of the City of Corona's Police Department response times. Data is pulled directly from the PD record management system. This system is updated real-time by dispatch and file personnel in the field. Important Notice: The City of Corona Fire and Police Department recently implemented a new Public Safety software solution. Due to this change, the data displayed on this dashboard is current up to 07/08/2019. We appreciate your patience as we work to correct this issue.
Update Frequency: Daily
Data Disclaimer: The City Of Corona (“Corona”) provides data available on this website as a service to the public. resource.name: CorStat - Unsheltered Homelessness
resource.description:
A count of the homeless neighbors who currently reside in Corona, CA. 

Data provided on the 'Outreach' portion of the dashboard is extracted via monthly reports provided by CityNet, a third party organization working with City of Corona to improve the lives of homeless neighbors. Point-In-Time count data is provided by the County of Riverside.

resource.name: CorStat - Finance Budget to Actual
resource.description: The City of Corona's 'Open Budget' is part of a citywide coordinated effort to provide greater transparency and foster an environment of openness in regards to the inner-workings of local government. The 'actuals' information is updated weekly on Saturday morning, after the accounts payable check run is complete.
